body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0022, 'Fatigue']/items[at0004]/value as T0_symptom_or_sign_name,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0022, 'Fatigue']/items[at0005]/value as T0_do_you_experience_a_rash_or,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0022, 'Breathing problems']/items[at0004]/value as T0_symptom_or_sign_name_1,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0022, 'Breathing problems']/items[at0005]/value as T0_do_you_experience_a_rash_or_1,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0022, 'Rash or reddening of the skin']/items[at0004]/value as T0_symptom_or_sign_name_2,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0022, 'Rash or reddening of the skin']/items[at0005]/value as T0_do_you_experience_a_rash_or_2
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.symptom_sign_screening.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
